name: food
description:
The food command extracts restaurants, cafes, and bars from OSM data with cuisine details. Supports filtering by:

- Type: restaurant, cafe, fast_food, bar, pub
- Cuisine: italian, chinese, indian, etc.
- Cuisine category: asian, european, american, middle_eastern

Includes service information (takeaway, delivery, outdoor seating).

options.-t, --type: Filter by type: restaurant, cafe, fast_food, bar, pub, etc.
options.-c, --cuisine: Filter by cuisine: italian, chinese, indian, etc.
options.--cuisine-category: Filter by category: asian, european, american, middle_eastern, fast_food, other
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Food places with:
- amenity: Type (restaurant, cafe, etc.)
- name: Business name
- cuisine: Cuisine type(s)
- opening_hours: Business hours
- phone, website: Contact info
- takeaway, delivery: Service options
- outdoor_seating: Patio availability
